Pretty awesome game! It is very similar to Counter Strike 1.6, but with graphics a bit better. You can find way more people playing online (which is good), and there are the classic mods like Gungame.

TBH this is the best CS game other than CS:NZ. This game blows CSGO out of the water. Trust me. The extra 5 bucks for this game is worth it. The community is way nicer. Deagle is still OP. Currently it is a little laggy for me but its not unplayable. Easy to get achivements just off of a little bit of gungame. I use a windows 8 laptop and it doesn't ever really run super slow. Over all I JUST RELALY LOVE THIS GAEM YUO KNWO? LEIK IT MEAKS ME CYR EVERYTEIM YOU KWNO?




go have fun. little timmy is waiting for you.
Why is this $19.99 but CS:GO is $15.99. Most servers are pretty much dead in my experience, I would highly recommend to get this if you're gonna get Gmod too.

This is an FPS made by valve.

The game is fun and has many servers to join most giving a whole new play type, it's fast and requires alot of focus to stop you from dying in 1-3 seconds of just spawing and walking around a corner.

The many gamemodes and stuff you can do is endless, the only downside is the lack of skins and players.

The few players are a good to talk to some less than others, but all good.

I rate this game 7/10.

OK, I've played GO: Can't stand it, the sounds, hitboxes, pretty much everything.
I've played 1.6: Grew up playing against my Dad, kicked his ***, loved it, recoil kills tho.
I've played CZ: I was yelling at how retarded the bots are, and just the point of the game in general.
Source: Mod it to much, gotta get them skin packs and map packs and bhop and whatnot. I migrated to this from GO, and it's hella better. Highly recommend it, even if you suck at CS in general.
Like CS:GO with no skins, so basically pointless.
If you're feeling nostalgic and feel like beatin' up on some terrorists, this is the game for you.
Really fun! All I really do is just surf, but it's still very fun. Could ask for more surf maps though. :/
